    Devon - Battle of the Fancy Dressers

    Go Beyond Dresses Up

    26th – 30th May 2025

    What's to get excited about!

    This adventure holiday will be not like any other adventure holiday you have ever heard of, let alone even been on before. There will be all the usual activities that you can expect from a Go Beyond adventure holiday, rafting, canoeing, climbing, archery and some team building exercises thrown in, with an indoor swimming pool for us to use. Plus there will be evening activities too, like quizzes, karaoke and disco dancing.

    But wait……. there is a twist! You will be divided into teams, and be competing against each another, with the team attaining most points winning a special prize.

    But hold on, there is another twist …… you will have to do all the activities in fancy dress!

    You can dress up as your favourite character, so we may see C3P0 on a horse, Harry Potter singing Karaoke to Taylor Swift, Barbie canoeing on the lake, Wednesday Adams cooperating in a team building activity or Spiderman on a bike.

    You can dress up as whoever you want, the choice is yours! You can be someone different each day, or the same character for the whole holiday, it is going to be so much fun!

    We’re super-excited to see you and your fabulous fancy dress outfits on this special Go Beyond UK holiday!

    Where you'll be staying...

    A Gold Standard AHEOC certified centre, Calvert Trust have been welcoming guests with various support needs since 1996. Situated at the edge of Wistlandpound Reservoir, among beautiful pine forests and rippling streams, nestled within the rolling hills of Devon’s Exmoor National Park.

    Food, glorious food!

    Exceptional inclusive catering at Calvert Exmoor whose kitchen staff are not only talented, skilled and passionate with anything food, but they are also genuine, kind and caring, frequently going out of their way to make sure that everyone is accounted for and fed well. A massive bonus for us. Whether you are gluten-free, vegetarian, vegan or even have particular sensory, texture or taste-based needs, we will make sure you are catered for.

    What you'll experience...

    We will meet at pick up points near London with other pick up points announced nearer the time. Our mini-buses will take you on the drive to the Calvert Trust in Devon.

    Our mini-buses will take you on the 2 hour and 30-minute drive to the accommodation, with stops along the way.

    Your holiday will include the following:

  • 4 night, full board accommodation.
  • All entrance fees to all activities and sites.
  • Transport in and around Devon.
  • A ratio of 2 guests to 1 Go Beyond support staff member.
  • Support from our Go Beyond team during the holiday.

    • Accessiblility and Inclusion

    Inclusion is important to us so we strive, whenever possible, to make our holidays accessible to all.

    If you wish to discuss your specific access requirement for any of our holidays, please contact us at your earliest convenience and we will do everything we can to welcome you to the Go Beyond Holidays experience.

    Holiday name
    Devon – Battle of the Fancy Dressers

    Date
    26th – 30th May 2025

    Nights
    4 nights

    Accommodation
    Calvert Trust, Exmoor, Devon

    Food
    All food will be catered by the Calvert Trust catering

    Price
    £2770 (All Inclusive)

    Day 1
    Travel from pick up points near London to Devon to our accommodation via mini bus, settle in.

    Day 2
    Rafting and Archery all in fancy dress

    Day 3
    Team Building Games all in fancy dress

    Day 4
    Rafting and Climbing all in fancy dress

    Day 5
    Drive back to drop off points near to London.

    Interested in this holiday?
